headline.main: The Latest: Chicago Beats Tampa 2-1, Evens Final at 2-2
headline.print_headline: The Latest: Chicago Beats Tampa 2-1, Evens Final at 2-2

docs.snippet: Jonathan Toews and Brandon Saad scored, Corey Crawford withstood a furious barrage in the closing minute and the Chicago Blackhawks beat the Tampa Bay Lightning 2-1 to tie the Stanley Cup Final at 2-2 on Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jonathan Toews and Brandon Saad scored, Corey Crawford withstood a furious barrage in the closing minute and the Chicago Blackhawks beat the Tampa Bay Lightning 2-1 to tie the Stanley Cup Final at 2-2 on Wednesday night.

headline.main: Chicago Police Union Fights Policy Banning Visible Tattoos
headline.print_headline: Chicago Police Union Fights Policy Banning Visible Tattoos

docs.snippet: The union representing Chicago police officers is fighting a new uniform policy, set to begin on Friday, that requires officers with visible tattoos to cover them up, a union official said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The union representing Chicago police officers is fighting a new uniform policy, set to begin on Friday, that requires officers with visible tattoos to cover them up, a union official said on Wednesday.

headline.main: UN Say Tens of Thousands Displaced in Darfur Attacks
headline.print_headline: UN Say Tens of Thousands Displaced in Darfur Attacks

docs.snippet: Increasing attacks on civilians in Sudan's conflict-torn Darfur region have forced tens of thousands of people to flee their homes this year — possibly more than 200,000, a senior U.N. official said Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Increasing attacks on civilians in Sudan's conflict-torn Darfur region have forced tens of thousands of people to flee their homes this year — possibly more than 200,000, a senior U.N. official said Wednesday.

headline.main: Texas Man, Dog, Die of Heat Exhaustion in Locked Car
headline.print_headline: Texas Man, Dog, Die of Heat Exhaustion in Locked Car

docs.snippet: Police say a 72-year-old Texas man and his dog died of apparent heat exhaustion after not being able to get out of his locked sports car....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police say a 72-year-old Texas man and his dog died of apparent heat exhaustion after not being able to get out of his locked sports car.

headline.main: Warning: Soda May Be Bad for Your Health, San Francisco Says

docs.snippet: San Francisco could soon be the first city in the country to place health warnings on advertisements for sugary drinks....
docs.abstract: San Francisco could soon be the first city in the country to place health warnings on advertisements for sugary drinks.

headline.main: St. Jude Classic Offers Up Final Test Before US Open
headline.print_headline: St. Jude Classic Offers Up Final Test Before US Open

docs.snippet: TPC Southwind looks nothing like Chambers Bay, leaving the St. Jude Classic to offer only that final chance at honing a swing or putting stroke under the mental pressure of competition....
docs.lead_paragraph: TPC Southwind looks nothing like Chambers Bay, leaving the St. Jude Classic to offer only that final chance at honing a swing or putting stroke under the mental pressure of competition.

headline.main: New York Escapees Could Be in Vermont

docs.snippet: State officials from New York and Vermont said at a news conference that the two escapees from a New York prison could be in Vermont....
docs.lead_paragraph: State officials from New York and Vermont said at a news conference that the two escapees from a New York prison could be in Vermont.

docs.snippet: Several new apps make it easy and quick to create collages with your photographs....
docs.lead_paragraph: Several new apps make it easy and quick to create collages with your photographs.

headline.main: Jury Selection Set in Federal Cyberstalking Trial
headline.print_headline: Jury Selection Set in Federal Cyberstalking Trial

docs.snippet: The federal judge presiding over a cyberstalking trial for relatives of a man who killed his former daughter-in-law at a Delaware courthouse will decide whether a purported "hit list" found in the shooter's car will be allowed into evidence....
docs.lead_paragraph: The federal judge presiding over a cyberstalking trial for relatives of a man who killed his former daughter-in-law at a Delaware courthouse will decide whether a purported "hit list" found in the shooter's car will be allowed into evidence.

headline.main: Chilean students protest lack of inclusion in education reform
headline.sub: Chilean students protest lack of inclusion in education reform

docs.snippet: Chilean students clash with riot police in the streets of Santiago, demanding a greater say in education reforms that brings schools under national jurisdiction. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chilean students clash with riot police in the streets of Santiago, demanding a greater say in education reforms that brings schools under national jurisdiction. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
